author: Special Correspondent
text:
A total of 35 electricity sub-stations in the State set up at total cost of over Rs. 1,033 crore were inaugurated by Chief Minister Jayalalithaa on Monday.

They are are located places such as Erode, Chennai, Kancheepuram, Tiruvallur, Krishnagiri, Nagapattinam, Tiruppur, Coimbatore, Salem, Sivaganga, Theni, Dindigal and Madurai.
title: 35 sub-stations inaugurated
